title: Deacon Eric Seitz on Aquinas, Divine Simplicity, and the Trinity
description:
Eric Seitz will be ordained as a Priest in the Catholic Church in just over a week. This will probably be the last recording of him as a Deacon. 

Eric and I had a 3 way conversation with Jacob that you can find here. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Llk3r3T63uE

The letter wiki conversation I am having with Tripp and Eric you can find here: https://letter.wiki/conversation/679

We discuss the Philosophy of Thomas Aquinas and Augustine, how that relates to the doctrine of divine simplicity, and whether or not that is compatible with the trinity.
